Return the Locket Objectives

Retrieve the stolen locket. Return the stolen locket.

Return the Locket Walkthrough

When your team first enters the Hollow (near X:167 Y:542), you find the Tiefling kid Meli stealing a locket from Barth. If you don't intervene, Barth will eventually attack Meli and be dragged away by the guards. You can intervene by speaking to Barth or Meli. If you side with Meli, he will escape.
